prod_short_desc: Escape from Bala-Tik and the dreaded Rathtars!
prod_long_desc:
Recreate epic scenes from Star Wars: The Force Awakens, as Han Solo and Chewbacca try to escape the clutches of Bala-Tik and his Guavian Security Soldiers aboard their freighter. Featuring a modular design for easy reconfiguration, the freighter sections contain authentic details like a lowering blast door, trapdoor and crawlspace in which to hide. Pull the correct fuse to release the 2 buildable Rathtar figures with posable tentacles and teeth, then rearrange the sections and play out another Rathtar escape! This great set includes 5 minifigures.
Includes 5 minifigures: Han Solo, Chewbacca, Bala-Tik and 2 Guavian Security Soldiers.
Also includes 2 buildable Rathtar figures with posable tentacles and teeth.
Features a modular interior build for easy reconfiguration, control panel detailing, lowering blast door, trapdoor and crawlspace, and a Rathtar release function.
Pull the fuse to release the mighty Rathtars!
Lift the trapdoor and hide under the floor.
Lower the blast door to trap Bala-Tik and his soldiers.
Rearrange the freighter sections for a variety of play scenarios.
Weapons include Han’s blaster pistol, Chewbacca’s bowcaster and 3 stud shooters with extra ammo.
Accessory elements include a bucket and a bone.
Recreate exciting scenes from the blockbuster movie Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
Freighter interior assembled end to end measures over 5” high, 3” wide and 15” long.
Each Rathtar with tentacles closed measures over 1” high, 2” wide and 2” long.
